list.name: Commit
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter

panels.content: **This dashboard has been automatically generated using the dashboard generator of OpenNTI** - It's very easy to personalize it and create your own.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_pkts"), 1s) AS "OUT",non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_pkts"), 1s) AS "IN" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$interface$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface_stats.if_name", "device" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_octets"), 1s)*8 AS "OUT",non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_octets"), 1s)*8 AS "IN" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$interface$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface_stats.if_name","device" fill(null)

SELECT mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_error") AS "out-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_discards") AS "in-discards", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_errors") AS "in-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_fifo_errors") AS "in-fifo-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_frame_errors") AS "in-frame-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2_mismatch_timeouts") AS "in-l2-mismatch-timeouts", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2chan_errors") AS "in-l2chan-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l3_incompletes") AS "in-l3-incompletes", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_qdrops") AS "in-qdrops", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_resource_errors") AS "in-resource-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_runts") AS "in-runts" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$interface$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_uc_pkts"), 1s) AS "out-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_mc_pkts"), 1s) AS "out-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_bc_pkts"), 1s) AS "out-broadcast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_uc_pkts"), 1s) AS "in-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_mc_pkts"), 1s) AS "in-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_bc_pkts"), 1s) AS "in-broadcast" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$interface$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.packets"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$interface$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$egress_queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "jnpr.analyticsd" WHERE "type" = 'queue-stats.latency' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND "interface" =~ /$interface$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "interface", "device"
SELECT "value"*8 FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'lsp_stats.byte_rate' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "lspname", "type"
SELECT "value" FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'lsp_stats.packet_rate' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "lspname"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("firewall_stats.counter_stats.bytes"), 10s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_firewall_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "firewall_stats.filter_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("firewall_stats.counter_stats.packets"), 10s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_firewall_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "firewall_stats.filter_name", "device" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("firewall_stats.memory_usage.allocated"), 10s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_firewall_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "firewall_stats.filter_name", "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'cpu_mem.bytes_allocated' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", time($GroupBy)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'cpu_mem.size' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", time($GroupBy)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jnpr.jvision" WHERE "type" = 'cpu_mem.utilization' AND "device" =~ /$host_regex$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface", time($GroupBy)

list.name: filter_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_firewall_ext" WITH KEY = "firewall_stats.filter_name"

list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WITH KEY = "interface_stats.if_name"

list.name: egress_queue
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WITH KEY = "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number"
